title: Tunneler

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, choose another player to Tunnel under. All their non-Unseen visitors will be roleblocked. You cannot build Tunnels under the houses of players who you've already built Tunnels under.
- At night, choose two players whose houses have Tunnels. Redirect all non-Unseen visitors from one house to another.
- At night, choose a player whose house has a Tunnel and allow your Assassin to set an ambush. The Assassin will kill all players who visit your target, but they cannot take any other action that night. 1 use.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Roleblock and control immune.
- You cannot use the Tunnels of Miners besides ones that you made, but you can use the Tunnels of other Tunnelers.
- Retain your Background that you received.
- You may place a Tunnel at an Unseen player's house who already has a Tunnel **once per player.**
- __**Part of the Daily Streak faction**__

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Eliminate those you wish to not convert, or those who will not join you.
